oai_dc:dc.dc:title: P-40 Aircraft Promotional Artwork - Image #5
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of promotional artwork for the P-40 Warhawk aircraft by Lloyd Howe. A P-40 engages naval vessels in gunfire.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Curtiss-Wright aircraft; World War, 1939-1945; United States. Army. Air Corps; Air pilots; P-40 (Fighter plane)
